author: tomaz
msg: For now also use the pricing module to store the vps.net prices.

author: mikemccand
msg: make sure max length term works

author: chirino
msg: Much better session management.  First off, fix a concurrent bug caused by modifying the sessions list from different thread.  Switch to using a set to track sessions to get constant insert and remove time.  Don't credit sessions until the overflow sink gets drained.

author: chirino
msg: Simplify launching of Apollo from an IDE.

author: chirino
msg: Limit the number of threads the blocking pool will create.  The broker was spawning way to many threads when hit concurrently with many login requests.  The max pool size is configurable with a system property.
